content:
I'd be happy to help you craft an email introduction and pitch for Associate Professor Tan Cher Heng. Here's a draft email that you can use as a starting point:

**Subject: Introduction and Exploring Opportunities for AI-Powered Medical Imaging Solutions**

Dear Associate Professor Tan Cher Heng,

I hope this email finds you well. My name is [Your Name], and I am the [Your Title] of [Your Company], a leading provider of AI-powered medical imaging software solutions. I came across your profile and was impressed by your work in the Department of Diagnostic Radiology at Singapore General Hospital, and I believe our solutions could be of great interest to SingHealth.

Our AI-powered medical imaging software is designed to improve patient outcomes and reduce costs by enhancing the accuracy and speed of diagnosis. Our solution can be integrated with existing medical imaging infrastructure, including MRI, CT, and Ultrasound machines, to provide radiologists with more accurate and detailed images. This can lead to better diagnosis, treatment, and patient care.

I would like to explore the possibility of discussing how our solution can benefit SingHealth and its patients. Our solution has already shown promising results in [briefly mention any relevant case studies or success stories]. I believe it could be a valuable addition to your department's imaging capabilities.

Would you be available to meet to discuss this further? I will be attending the Healthcare Innovation Summit Asia 2023 and would like to take the opportunity to meet with you in person. I've suggested a few dates and times below:

* March 20, 2023, 2:00 pm - 3:00 pm
* March 21, 2023, 10:00 am - 11:00 am
* March 22, 2023, 3:00 pm - 4:00 pm

Please let me know if any of these times work for you, or if you would prefer an alternative time. I look forward to the opportunity to discuss how our solution can benefit SingHealth.

Best regards,

[Your Name]

**Pitch:**

When you meet with Associate Professor Tan Cher Heng, you can expand on the benefits of your AI-powered medical imaging software solution, highlighting how it can:

1. **Improve diagnostic accuracy**: By providing radiologists with more accurate and detailed images, your solution can reduce errors and misdiagnosis.
2. **Enhance patient care**: With faster and more accurate diagnosis, patients can receive timely treatment, leading to better outcomes and reduced morbidity.
3. **Reduce costs**: By streamlining the diagnostic process and reducing the need for repeat imaging, your solution can help SingHealth reduce costs and optimize resource allocation.
4. **Support research and innovation**: Your solution can provide valuable insights and data to support research and innovation in medical imaging, which can further improve patient outcomes.

Be prepared to provide more information on your solution, including any relevant case studies, technical specifications, and implementation timelines.

**Meeting Dates and Times:**

I've suggested a few dates and times that take into account the Healthcare Innovation Summit Asia 2023, which you can adjust according to your schedule and preferences. Make sure to leave some buffer time between meetings and allow for flexibility in case the meeting runs longer than expected.

Let me know if you'd like me to revise the email or pitch, or if you have any further questions!
